name: appalachian-town-halls
description: Interactive about town hall meetings held by members of congress with districts in Appalachia.

scripts.build:scripts:app: browserify $npm_package_config_externalargs -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015  ] ] -t uglifyify --debug --standalone TownHalls js/src/app.js > js/app.min.js
scripts.build: yarn run build:scripts:vendor; yarn run build:scripts:app
scripts.watch:scripts:app: watchify js/src/app.js -o js/app.min.js $npm_package_config_externalargs -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015  ] ] --debug --standalone TownHalls

author: Geoff Hing <geoffhing@gmail.com>
